cases.title: Social Betting MVP
cases.summary: Simulated product focused on engagement and retention in a no-login social betting context.
cases.context: Led the development of a social betting MVP that aimed to increase user engagement through social features and gamification.
cases.challenge: Design a betting platform that would attract and retain users without requiring a login, while maintaining high engagement rates.
decisions: Implemented a cookie-based anonymous user system
Created a social leaderboard with temporary nicknames
Designed a progressive revelation of features based on user engagement
results: Average of 8 bets per user per session
85% of users engaged with social features

cases.title: EV Charging Network Platform
cases.summary: Developed a comprehensive platform for managing and monitoring electric vehicle charging stations across multiple regions.
cases.context: Led the development of a unified platform to manage a network of EV charging stations, focusing on both B2B and B2C aspects.
cases.challenge: Create a scalable platform that could handle real-time monitoring of charging stations while providing a seamless experience for both station operators and end users.
decisions: Implemented real-time monitoring system with webhook notifications
Designed a flexible pricing model for different user segments
Created a unified dashboard for station operators
